title: I got banned For something I didnt do. WHYY?
body: I was playing League Of Legends and then i went to bed when i woke up i started my League Client and BOOM it says that im banned i go to my email and its says that i used 3rd party programs BUT I DIDNT i dont even know how to install them . And if someone from Riot is reading this please help me I didnt hack or nothing u can watch my matches  I DIDNT HACK. Please help. ;(

replies.body:
First off, this is the wrong section. It goes in player behavior and moderation.

If you think you were banned in error you can make a support ticket requesting a review of your account, but they isually only ban for third party apps when they are absolutely sure you are doing it. Make a support ticket and see where it takes you.
